@graph.title: The Oxford handbook of William Wordsworth
@graph.abstract: Genius Loci / Geoffrey Hartman -- Prelude: Of 'Daffodils' (1802-1815) and 'Yew-Trees' (1804-1836), Poems of Imagination / Richard Gravil and Daniel Robinson -- 1. The Early Life of William Wordsworth, 1770-1800 / Nicholas Roe -- 2. Wordsworth's Domestic Life, 1800-1850 / K.E. Smith -- 3. Wordsworth and Literary Friendship / Felicity James -- 4. Wordsworth as Professional Author / Brian Goldberg -- 5. Itinerant Wordsworth / C.E.J. Simons -- 6. Wordsworth's Political Odyssey / Simon Bainbridge -- 7. The Salisbury Plain Poems (1793-1842) / Quentin Bailey -- 8. The Borderers (1796-1842) / Frederick Burwick -- 9. Wordsworth and Coleridge's Lyrical Ballads, 1798 / Daniel Robinson-- 10. 'Poem upon the Wye' / Susan J. Wolfson -- 11. Wordsworth's Lyrical Ballads, 1800 / Jason N. Goldsmith -- 12. The Lyric Impulse of Poems, in Two Volumes / Gregory Leadbetter -- 13. 'Ode: Intimations of Immortality from Recollections of Early Childhood' / Michael O'Neill -- 14. Wordsworth's Characters / Matthew C. Brennan -- 15. The White Doe of Rylstone and Later Narrative Poems / Peter J. Manning -- 16. The River Duddon and Wordsworth, Sonneteer / Daniel Robinson -- 17. Wordsworth's Poetry of Place / Fiona Stafford -- 18. Wordsworth's Later Poetry / Pamela Woof -- 19. The 'Recluse' Project and its Shorter Poems / Richard Gravil -- 20. The Pedlar, the Poet, and 'The Ruined Cottage' / Paul H. Fry -- 21. The 'I' in The Prelude  / Anthony John Harding -- 22. The Prelude as Philosophical Poem / Mark J. Bruhn -- 23. The Prelude as History / Philip Shaw -- 24. The Excursion as Dialogic Poem / Jacob Risinger -- 25. Wordsworth's English Poets / Jonathon Shears -- 26. Wordsworth and Sensibility / Duncan Wu -- 27. Wordsworth's Theory of Poetry / Raimonda Modiano -- 28. Wordsworth and Coleridge on Imagination / Alexander Schlutz -- 29. Wordsworth's Prosody / Ruth Abbott -- 30. Wordsworth's Experiments with Form and Genre / Charles Mahoney -- 31. Wordsworth's Communicative Strategies in his Experimental Poems / Don Bialostosky -- 32. Wordsworth and Classical Humanism / John Cole -- 33. Wordsworth and Enlightenment Philosophy / Allison Dushane -- 34. Wordsworth and Science / Marilyn Gaull -- 35. Wordsworth and Landscape / James A. Heffernan -- 36. Wordsworth and Shepherds / Terry McCormick -- 37. Wordsworth on Gender and Sexuality / Judith W. Page -- 38. Wordsworth and Nation / Stephen C. Behrendt -- 39. Wordsworth's Ethical Thinking / Adam Potkay -- 40. Wordsworth on Religious Experience / Jonathan Roberts -- 41. Wordsworth, Child Psychology, and the Growth of the Mind / Peter Newbon -- 42. Wordsworth and the 'Life of Things' / James Castell -- 43. Wordsworth among the Romantics / Matthew Scott -- 44. 'Intimations' in America / Richard Gravil -- 45. Wordsworth and Twentieth-Century Poets / John Powell Ward -- 46. Wordsworth in Modern Literary Criticism / Andrew Bennett -- 47. Editing Wordsworth in the Twentieth Century / Bruce E. Graver
